Package app.photoapplication.controller

Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
app.photoapplication.controller.LogoutController
app.photoapplication.controller.AlbumController
public class AlbumController extends LogoutController
The controller class for managing album actions.
Author:
Jimmy Han, Luthfi Jamal Mohamed
